items.headline: Alphabet’s stock is the most overbought ever by one measure. Is that a problem?

items.headline: Why oil is on track to post its largest yearly decline since the pandemic
items.summary_en: Oil prices remain on track for their largest yearly loss since the pandemic. They may be near a short-term bottom, however, with the lower prices likely to boost demand and temper global production.
